sticky.description: For sticky elements such as headers or footers that stay fixed while scrolling

nav.description: For navigation elements like sidebars or navigation bars

toast.description: For toast notifications that appears above most UI elements

overlay.description: For overlays such as modal and drawers backdrops

drawer.description: For drawers, such as side panels or sliding menus

deep.description: for decorative backgrounds and layers under main content

modal.description: For modals that appear above overlays

popout.description: Used for popouts, such as dropdowns or menus
